title: Was a Vigilante Arrested for Killing 30 Pedophiles in Mass Murder Spree?
subtitle: Reports that an arrested Nebraska man confessed to murdering more than 30 sex offenders in a 15-year vigilante killing spree are fake news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An arrested Nebraska man confessed to murdering more than 30 sex offenders in a 15-year vigilante killing spree.
